project_proponents: What are the project proponents, includind organization name, phone number, email address, state/city and country of the entity responsible for managing this carbon project?
methodology: What are the methodologies of this project?
project_location: What are the project city, country, latitude, and longitude of this project?
crediting period: What are the start and end dates of the crediting period for this project?
sector: What is the project sector, either Renewable Energy or Forestry and Land Use?
ghg_emission_reductions: Get all the yearly Estimated GHG Emission Reductions or Removals records for this project.
